entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 10 September 2016
